newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Isocor estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Isocor estimates cut.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist said its analyst Rakesh Sood cut his earnings estimates for Isocor following the company's announcement of a first quarter earnings shortfall.

-- In a statement, Sood said he cut his 1997 estimate to a loss of $0.50 a share on sales of $25.5 million from a profit of $0.18/shr on sales of $34.0 million. He cut his 1998 estimate to a profit of $0.34/shr on sales of $42.3 million from $0.35/shr and $50.1 million, respectively.
-- Earlier, Isocor said it expected revenues ranging from $3.7 to $4.2 million and a net loss for the first quarter citing a market transition away from its line of X.400 products.
